name: Iris School of Wizardry -Vinculum Hearts-
summary: You'll be attending with not only from the wealthy family, but also smart and talented boys and girls attends. School life romance game at the school of magic that everybody wants to attend. The game includes full voice recorded with main cast of popular voice actor Tetsuya Kakihara, Tomohisa Hashizume, Ryosuke Kanemoto, Yuta Kasuya, Kazuyuki Okitsu, Mitsuki Saiga, Atsushi Kakehashi, Atsushi Miyauchi, Nobuhiko Okamoto.
